summary: The puppets battle their most powerful enemy yet as they protect their new master from the demon God that created the Secret of Life.
cast: Gordon Currie|Chandra West|Ian Ogilvy|Teresa Hill|Guy Rolfe|Nicholas Guest|Willard E. Pugh|Diane McBain|Duane Whitaker|Kaz Garas|Clu Gulager|Harri James|Ron O'Neal|Chuck Williams|Ash Adams|Albert Band|Christopher Hayes|Jake McKinnon|Felton Perry|Stacie Randall|Michael Shamus Wiles|Dan Zukovic
title: Puppet Master 5
